summary.span: 在 控件中显示一个列标题。

span.span: Displays a single column header in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列标题是中的项包含标题文本的控件。A column header is an item in a control that contains heading text. 可以将对象添加到使用方法的类。 objects can be added to a using the method of the class. 若要添加的列组，可以使用方法的类。To add a group of columns to a , you can use the method of the class. 可以使用的属性类来确定在何处位于。You can use the property of the class to determine where the is located in the . 提供了和属性设置在控件和在列标题文本的对齐方式显示的文本。 provides the and properties to set the text displayed in the control and the alignment of the text in the column header. 若要确定是否与相关联控件，可以引用属性。To determine whether a is associated with a control, you can reference the property. 如果你想要复制以供在其他控件，可以使用方法。If you want to copy a for use in another control, you can use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 此示例将创建对象，并设置列标题，和属性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 该示例还添加项和子项到。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中，窗体并调用`PopulateListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法是仅一次有效，并包含已构造和使用的项填充该列。Calling the method is only effective once the and containing have been constructed, and the column is populated with items. 如果将新项添加到，该列不会调整大小，除非再次调用。If new items are added to the , the column will not resize unless is called again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便可以通过垃圾回收回收其占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则为资源是使用之前，不会释放垃圾回收调用对象的析构函数。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在 中的图像的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed in the .

value.span: 显示在 中的图像的索引。

span.span: The index of the image displayed in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是指的由指定的映像索引的属性，其中包含。The property refers to the index of an image specified by the property of the that contains the . 属性返回-1，如果没有任何上包含的设置。The property returns -1 if there is no set on the containing . 在列中显示的图像通常用于指示列中的项的状态。The image displayed in a column is typically used to indicate the state of items in the column. 和是互斥的这意味着如果其中一个是设置，另会设置为值无效且被忽略。 and are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 与关联的图像通常用来指示状态信息。The image associated with a is typically used to indicate the state information. 如果您设置为大于关联的图像列表中的最后一项的索引值将设置为图像列表中的最后一项的索引。If you set the to a value greater than the index of the last item in the associated image list, will be set to the index of the last item in the image list.

span.span: is less than -1.

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在列中的图像的键。

span.span: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in the column.

value.span: 显示在列中的图像的键。

span.span: The key of the image displayed in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性是互相排斥，这意味着如果一个设置，另会设置为值无效且被忽略。The and properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 如果设置为无效值，将不会显示图像，并将不会引发异常。If is set to an invalid value, an image will not be displayed, and an exception will not be thrown. 与关联的图像通常用来指示状态信息。The image associated with a is typically used to indicate the state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值不会不一定对应于当前的 visual 中的列标题位置。The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the column header within the . 这可能是由于用户在运行时的重新排序的列标题 (当属性设置为`true`)。This can be due to the user reordering the column headers at run time (when the property is set to `true`). 如果不包含在控制此属性返回值为-1。If the is not contained within a control this property returns a value of -1.

summary.span: 获取或设置 中所显示文本的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the text displayed in the .
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性来提供不同的文本中每个显示的文本的对齐方式设置。You can use this property to provide different text alignment settings for the text displayed in each . > [!NOTE] > 由于基础控件中的限制，此属性不起作用中的第一列上控件，它始终左对齐。Due to a limitation in the underlying control, this property has no effect on the first column in the control, which is always aligned to the left. 若要解决这一限制[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，可以处理事件和您自己绘制列标题。To work around this limitation in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can handle the event and paint the column header yourself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 此示例将创建对象，并设置列标题，和属性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 该示例还添加项和子项到。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中，窗体并调用`PopulateListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置列的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the column.

value.span: 列的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width of the column, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置的。This property enables you to set the of the . 可以设置在运行时对列内容或标题调整。The can be set to adjust at run time to the column contents or heading. 若要调整列中的最长的项的宽度，请设置属性设置为-1。To adjust the width of the longest item in the column, set the property to -1. 为列标题的宽度自动调整大小，为设置属性设置为-2。To autosize to the width of the column heading, set the property to -2. > [!NOTE] > 当所有列的总的宽度超过 32768 个像素时则会导致意外的行为。Unexpected behavior can result when the combined width of all columns exceeds 32,768 pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化控件。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 此示例将创建对象，并设置列标题，和属性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 该示例还添加项和子项到。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要运行此示例，请粘贴下面的代码中，窗体并调用`PopulateListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理程序。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]
